message: No Previously Generated Season Trend Summary or Weekly Summaries were provided. Cannot produce a fact-driven Season Trend Summary without those inputs.
required_inputs: Weekly Summaries for all past weeks (week-by-week summaries for each team)
notes: Please supply the previously generated season summary and the weekly summaries for all past weeks. The summary will include team-level trends (streaks, over/under performance, scoring patterns), player-level trends (repeat top performers or underperformers as they impact teams), league-wide insights (upsets, average scoring, close games), notable owner behaviors, and playoff-driven analysis for the top 6 teams.
